title: Introducing: Spirit House
body:
Hailing from New Mexico, **Spirit House** write blisteringly perfect indie pop tracks, with their two debut outings showcasing very differing aspects to the group.

Take _Smile_; at only two minutes in length, it conveys a ludicrous amount, part **MGMT**, part **Two Door Cinema Club**, there’s no cheap tricks or gimmicks, just stellar songwriting. On the flip side, _Winter Adventure Land_ is a drone inspired instrumental affair, proving the ideal comedown from the sugar rush of it’s predecessor. Check out both tracks below.
